attributes.action: give consideration to awarding Des O'Connor an OBE for his services to entertainment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Des has been performing since 1958 and has achieved the accolade of being one of the few British entertainers to have had a show running in the USA and the UK,plus his work for charities.
We feel that as one of the countries few remaining "real" entertainers he should no longer go unrecognised
